General.Name: Changchun UP Optotech Co Ltd
General.Description: Changchun UP Optotech Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of photoelectric measurement and control equipment, new medical equipment, optical materials, grating encoders, carbon fiber composite, and other products in China. Its products include photoelectric theodolite optical-mechanical subsystems, aviation/aerospace camera optical-mechanical subsystems, new radar antenna bases, precision turntables, military and civilian dual-use medical testing instruments, grating encoders, missile rockets and space structural parts, and k9 optical glass, etc. Changchun UP Optotech Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Changchun, China.
General.Address: Changchun Economic and Tech Dev Zne, Changchun, China, 130033
